Detailed Description

Packet used to get the smallest cost for routing from one map to another.

After the normal RequestPacket header this packet contains (X is REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE):
PosSizeComment
X 4 bytes Number of map pairs in the request.
X + 4 4 bytes The user defined data
X + 8 4 bytes The map pairs, for which to get the smallest routing cost.
